    • Uses of ContentSearch in cscie97.asn4.ecommerce.csv

      Methods in cscie97.asn4.ecommerce.csv that return ContentSearch 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ContentSearch SearchEngine.getContentSearchForCSV(java.lang.String queryLine)
      Given a string line with content search criteria from the original query CSV file, parse the contents of the search query and create and return a new ContentSearch object that can be passed to IProductAPI to execute the actual query OR can be used in DynamicCollections as the content item search criteria.
